Name: Flooding
Description: If set, then the neighbor with that network address has been selected as flooding MPR

Name: Routing
Description: If set, then the neighbor with that network address has been selected as routing MPR, either for the link metric types reported in an MPR_TYPES TLV (in the same order), or (if no MPR_TYPES TLV is present) then (first octet bit 6, value 0x02) for the single administratively agreed link metric type
